welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.step1: Welcome to Bingo Player! With this app, you can forget about pencils and mistakes. Follow these simple steps and get ready to shout BINGO!
welcome.step2: You can use Bingo Player in any situation where bingo is being played in person with printed cards, whether it's a formal or casual event.
welcome.step4: Create and use the game modes
welcome.step5: Mark the numbers that are being announced

scan.title: Scan Cards
scan.step1: Scan your cards for free, one by one. To ensure accuracy, focus solely on the box containing the numbers.
scan.step2: Why not simplify it? Upgrade to PRO and scan multiple cards at once. A single photo is enough to recognize all your numbers.
scan.step3: We understand the confusion. We previously offered this feature broadly, but multi-card scanning is an intensive process that relies on our AI technology. The operational costs associated with AI processing require us to limit its access to the PRO subscription.
